# Copilot Instructions for Real Calçados Project

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created. - File created successfully.

- [x] Install Extensions - Installed Tailwind CSS IntelliSense and ESLint extensions in VS Code.
- [x] Compile the Project - Ran npm run build successfully.
- [x] Create and Execute Task - Created tasks.json for running the development server and started the dev server.
- [x] Launch the Project - Opened the browser to view the running application at http://localhost:3000.
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - Verified README.md and recreated copilot-instructions.md with current project information.
